title: Maria Holic
alternative_title: まりあほりっく ; 瑪莉亞狂熱 ; Maria Hollic ; Maria+Holic ; Maria-Holic
status: まりあほりっく ; 瑪莉亞狂熱 ; Maria Hollic ; Maria+Holic ; Maria-Holic
description:
Description :
        This is a story that revolves around a lesbian high school girl, Kanako Miyamae, who is scared of boys and breaks out in hives if a boy touches her. During her second year of high school, she enrolls in an all-girls school hoping to find a female romantic partner. However, her ideal candidate, Maria Shid?, turns out to be a sadistic crossdressing boy.
